titles: A fooles bolt is soone shot Good friends beware, I'me like to hit yee, what ere you be heer's that will fit yee; which way soeuer that you goe, at you I ayme my bolt and bowe. To the tune of, Oh no no no not yet.
author: T. F., fl. 1630.
notes: Printer's name and publication date suggested by STC; publisher's name from STC.
Verse - "Stand wide my masters, and take heed,".
Reproduction of the original in the Pepys Library.
